jinfo.title: Pizza Executive - Tasty Pizzas
jinfo.description: The Pizza Executive would be making pizza, delivering pizza (when required), handling the guests and taking the orders of our guests.

jinfo.title: Tutor - ALS Coaching Classes
jinfo.description: The Tutor would be teaching various batches of students, creating question banks and keeping record of students.

jinfo.title: Data Entry Executive - Typing Solution
jinfo.description: The Data Entry Executive would do the data entry, collect the data from different sources, regularly update the data-sheets and inform about the work updates daily.

jinfo.title: Restaurant Team Member - Brew and Brooks
jinfo.description: The Restaurant Team Member would serve our guests, deliver the food (when required), handle the guests and take the orders of our guests.

jinfo.title: Cab Driver - Our Cabs
jinfo.description: The Cab Driver would drive the cab, handle the passengers professionally, keep record of number of daily rides, give updates about daily revenue.
